means: 继承人( heir的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The socialists saw themselves as true heirs of the Enlightenment.
sentence.Network_cn: 社会主义者认为自己是启蒙运动的真正继承者.

sentence.Network_en: He distributed his possessions among his heirs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把自己的财产分给继承人.

sentence.Network_en: Later their heirs would establish the largest philanthropic foundations in America.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来他们的继承人建立起美国最大的慈善基金会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: in the last century , however , four successive heirs were of a dissolute and wasteful disposition , and the family ruin was eventually completed by a gambler in the days of the Regency .但是，上个世纪，由于四个继承人的肆意挥霍和不划算的出售，这个家族最终在摄政期间被一个赌徒完全毁掉。
We dare not forget today that we are the heirs of that first revolution ., 今天 , 我们不敢有忘 , 我们乃是那第一次革命的后裔.
a reversion to the state ( as the ultimate owner of property of legal heirs .无法定继承人时复归给国家（作为最终财产拥有人)的权益。
but from the hand of God . we dare not forget today that we are the heirs of that first revolution .我们不敢忘记今天我们仍然是第一次革命的后继人。

list.abs: They refused to recognize him as the lawful heir ., 他们拒绝承认他为合法继承人.
H ... heir at law 法定继承人， heir presumptive 假定继承人 heiress 女继承人.
1714年前，除了当然继承人(heir apparent)及其妻子以外，其他王室成员是否享有这些头衔和尊称并无明确规定。1301年起，英格兰 …
专业术语之政治_听妈妈的话_百度空间 ... hearing (美)听证会 heir apparent [律]有确定继承权的人 high gear 开足马力，高速度.
lovesick schoolboy害相思病的小男生male heir男性继承人fell from favour失宠

entry.def: An heir is someone who has the right to inherit a person's money, property, or title when that person dies.

example.ex: His heir, Lord Doune, cuts a bit of a dash in the city.
example.tran: 他的继承人杜恩勋爵在城里出了一番风头。

auth_sentence.content: Your heirs don't owe income tax on withdrawals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your heirs don't owe income tax on withdrawals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your heirs don't owe income tax on withdrawals.

auth_sentence.content: Still, Drexler made Fisher and his heirs billionaires.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, Drexler made Fisher and his heirs billionaires.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, Drexler made Fisher and his heirs billionaires.

auth_sentence.content: We are the heirs of habits and mental customs.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are the heirs of habits and mental customs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are the heirs of habits and mental customs.

Sentence.sentence: Copyright laws differ from country to country, but in general protection extends for the duration of an author's life and for a substantial period afterwards, thus allowing the author's heirs to benefit.
